languages.text: "Недавно я спас{mf||ла} рабочего от побоев — где же моя песня? Или для такой чести надо быть вымышленным персонажем?"

traits.locale_text: "Недавно я спас{mf||ла} рабочего от побоев — где же моя песня? Или для такой чести надо быть вымышленным персонажем?"

languages.text: "I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"
languages.original_text: "Недавно я спас{mf||ла} рабочего от побоев — где же моя песня? Или для такой чести надо быть вымышленным персонажем?"

traits.locale_text: "I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"
"I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"
"I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"
"I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"
"I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"
"I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"

languages.text: «He salvado a un trabajador de que le apaleen hace nada, ¿dónde está mi cantar? ¿O es que tengo que ser un personaje de ficción para que se me conceda tal honor?».
languages.original_text: "I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"

traits.locale_text: «He salvado a un trabajador de que le apaleen hace nada, ¿dónde está mi cantar? ¿O es que tengo que ser un personaje de ficción para que se me conceda tal honor?».

languages.text: 「私は最近、労働者を殴打から救った。それなのに、私の歌はできないのか？そんな名誉を与えられるには、架空の人物でなければならないのか？」
languages.original_text: "I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"

traits.locale_text: 「私は最近、労働者を殴打から救った。それなのに、私の歌はできないのか？そんな名誉を与えられるには、架空の人物でなければならないのか？」

languages.text: “我前不久刚刚救了个遭到毒打的工人，可歌颂我的歌谣在哪里呢？还是说，只有虚构的人物才能得到这样的荣耀？”
languages.original_text: "I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"

traits.locale_text: “我前不久刚刚救了个遭到毒打的工人，可歌颂我的歌谣在哪里呢？还是说，只有虚构的人物才能得到这样的荣耀？”

languages.text: "Ich habe kürzlich einen Arbeiter vor einer Tracht Prügel bewahrt ... wer singt darüber? Oder muss man eine Romanfigur sein, um eine solche Ehre zu erfahren?"
languages.original_text: "I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe kürzlich einen Arbeiter vor einer Tracht Prügel bewahrt ... wer singt darüber? Oder muss man eine Romanfigur sein, um eine solche Ehre zu erfahren?"

languages.text: « J'ai récemment sauvé un ouvrier qui était sur le point de se faire tabasser. Où est ma chanson ? Faut-il vraiment être un personnage de fiction pour mériter un tel honneur ? »
languages.original_text: "I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai récemment sauvé un ouvrier qui était sur le point de se faire tabasser. Où est ma chanson ? Faut-il vraiment être un personnage de fiction pour mériter un tel honneur ? »

languages.text: "İşçinin tekini dayaktan kurtardım. Hani benim şarkım? Böylesi bir onurun bahşedilmesi için kurgu karakter mi olmak gerekiyor?"
languages.original_text: "I recently saved a labourer from a beating — where is my song? Or must one be a fictional character to be granted such an honour?"
